meanings.definition: A toxic compound found in cottonseed oil.
meanings.sent1: The gossypols in the cottonseed oil can be harmful if consumed in large amounts.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are cautious about the presence of gossypols in cottonseed oil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally spilled gossypols in the kitchen, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The gossypols in the cottonseed oil acted like tiny guards, protecting it from spoilage.
meanings.sent5: The bright warning label on the bottle reminded everyone of the dangerous gossypols inside.

meanings.definition: A group of polyphenolic compounds found in cottonseed.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying the effects of gossypols on human health.
meanings.sent2: The gossypols in cottonseed have antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chewed on the cottonseed, unaware of the gossypols inside.
meanings.sent4: The gossypols in the cottonseed danced together like a colorful group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh cottonseed filled the air, carrying hints of the beneficial gossypols.
